common.model

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.model.AbstractType
      • common.model.AbstractSquare
        • common.model.AbstractContainer
          • common.model.Square
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICopy, ISource, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EliminationSquare, StartAsSixSquare

    public class Square
extends AbstractContainer
implements ISource, java.io.Serializable
    Square contains whether it is selected is a regular square that can hold tiles.
    Author:
    njpanzarino, jasirocki - jdoc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
